summary: An email from an FBI Special Agent to an unspecified recipient, transmitting a federal grand jury subpoena addressed to American Airlines for records, with an expedited due date of February 7, 2020. The email identifies the matter as child exploitation/human trafficking and requests the recipient not notify the subscriber.

persons.name: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting a federal grand jury subpoena to American Airlines in a child exploitation/human trafficking investigation.

events.title: Subpoena Due Date
events.description: The expedited due date for American Airlines to comply with a federal grand jury subpoena.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking

events.title: Subpoena Issued to American Airlines
events.description: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued to American Airlines, as indicated by the attached file name.
personsInvolved: Special Agent FBI New York Child Exploitation & Human Trafficking

keyFacts: A federal grand jury subpoena was issued to American Airlines in January 2020 as part of a child exploitation/human trafficking investigation.
The FBI requested expedited compliance by February 7, 2020, and asked that the subscriber (likely the target of the records request) not be notified.
The document reference EFTA00153627 is included, linking it to the broader Epstein case document set.
